headline: Explainer on barring Kneecap
quote: Canada stands firmly against hate speach [...] and the glorification of terrorism
summary: Says Irish group Kneecap won’t be allowed in over ‘antisemitic’ statements presented as anti-Israel criticism.
commentary: Conflates anti-Zionism/anti-Israel speech with antisemitism; raises free-expression concerns and chill on criticism of state policy.

headline: Reposted PM statement on East Jerusalem attack
quote: Canada condemns the terrorist attack in East Jerusalem today that has taken civilian lives and injured so many...
summary: Gasparro amplifies the Prime Minister’s statement on an attack in East Jerusalem.
commentary: Continues pattern of highlighting attacks on Israelis without parallel posts acknowledging Palestinian civilian deaths or UN findings.

headline: Two-state solution video
quote: Two-state solution is only possible when Israel can have peace and security beside a viable Palestinian state.
summary: Says two-state is possible only with Israeli security beside a viable Palestinian state.
commentary: Security-first framing; no mention of proportionality or UN findings in the video post.

headline: Shares PM statement on antisemitic assault in Ottawa
quote: We stand with you against hate and threats to your safety, and we will act to confront antisemitism wherever it appears.
summary: Posts Prime Minister’s statement about the assault of a Jewish woman at an Ottawa grocery store; expresses support for the Jewish community and law enforcement.
commentary: Highlights antisemitic violence in Canada; no comparable posts in the same period acknowledging Palestinian Canadians’ experiences or UN-documented civilian deaths.

headline: Letter to Mayor Valérie Plante
quote: Please find my letter to Mayor @val_plante regarding the rise of Antisemitism in Montreal.
summary: Posts letter to Montréal’s mayor on antisemitism.
commentary: Legitimate concern, but no parallel concern for Palestinian Canadians facing discrimination or grief.

headline: Please see my full statement…
quote: Please see my full statement on Prime Minister Mark Carney’s intention to recognize a Palestinian state above.
commentary: Same framing; no balancing humanitarian law context in the post itself.

headline: Visited the Nova Exhibit
quote: Alongside Prime Minister @markjcarney and my colleague @leslie.church, I visited the Nova Exhibit again today... I encourage as many people as possible to attend the @novaexhibition...
summary: Encourages attendance at Nova Exhibit memorializing Oct 7.
commentary: Frames Hamas’s Oct 7 crimes; again no parallel post acknowledging Palestinian civilians or UN findings in the same timeframe.

headline: Walk with Israel post
quote: Once again I joined the @ujafederation Walk with Israel, the largest annual gathering of the Jewish community in Canada.
summary: Participates in UJA Walk with Israel event.
commentary: Public solidarity with pro-Israel event; no parallel acknowledgement of Palestinian civilian deaths in same period.
